snippet: Lawmakers on Thursday morning approved a measure to cut the retirement benefits for future public employees, dealing a defeat to labor unions at the end of a dramatic all-night session.
abstract: New York State lawmakers approve a measure to cut the retirement benefits for future public employees, dealing a defeat to labor unions at the end of a dramatic all-night session; approval comes after the Legislature also approved a reconfiguration of the state's Assembly and Senate districts.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and JOHN ELIGON

lead_paragraph: Lawmakers on Thursday morning approved a measure to cut the retirement benefits for future public employees, dealing a defeat to labor unions at the end of a dramatic all-night session.

headline.seo: In Albany, Lawmakers Approve Pension Cuts and Redistricting
headline.main: New York Lawmakers Vote to Limit Public Pensions
headline.print_headline: In Albany, Lawmakers Approve Pension Cuts and Redistricting
